metadata.synopsis: One liners for Gondian Worker05 (Bala Ofran) after the player has visited the Iron Throne and has begun to liberate the gnomes in the Steel Foundry.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen debug bookSet flag for haivng saved prisonersGo to -1937; 0; 443Kill enemeisdisarm all kill switches that join combatClick on Bala Ofran

0.speaker: Gondian Bala Ofran
0.text: We heard trouble was coming - glad to see I could lend a hand.
0.context: NodeContext: after a fight, exhilirated, fought back against her captors (trouble is the player in this case)

1.speaker: Gondian Bala Ofran
1.text: The Control Centre is straight on through. You can't miss it.
1.context: NodeContext: gesturing in front of her vaguely (as she could be facing any direction)

2.speaker: Gondian Bala Ofran
2.text: Blessed Gond, I thought no one was coming for us. Thank you!

3.speaker: Gondian Bala Ofran
3.text: Don't let these bastards hurt anyone else.
3.context: NodeContext: after a fight, exhilirated, fought back against her captors
